replies.body: So you nerf everything except such things as Nidalee's Q, Yasuo's Ridiculous Crit damage, Vel'koz's passive doing over-the-top damage, Pantheon's Passive Recharge rate (which is funny because it happens to appear almost instantaneously when you hit a move), LeBlanc's ridiculous burst damage, Ezreal's ability to kill everyone using both ad and ap, etc. I mean I could go on but there are way too many unbalanced champs rito. Fix it please!~

Not sure if this post is serious...
Pantheon's balanced, Yasuo is situational (and he doesn't get bonus crit damage, just chance), and Vel'koz's passive is fine. Everything else is debatable, but Ezreal being able to build viably with AP or AD is what the game *should* be.
also, iirc yasuo actually gets LESS crit damage to go with his bonus crit chance.
He is serious but he's unranked and has 165 normal wins so...
If everyone is unbalanced or broken, then isn't everybody balanced? lol
DotA logic, it works
Not when only half the champions are broken, and the rest are weak.

Thank you so much for making that range on kass less pathetic. It made him so bad, it was unbelievable; now it is just enough to make it a tolerable nerf, rather than a completely over the top semi truck landing on his face.
Riot, fix Vayne's bug please... when her arrows shoot out and you press on another minion like 0.1 second too early it cancels the arrow that shot out just seriously wtf...

Thats not a bug, thats canceling an auto attack buddy. It doesn't happen to just Vayne you can cancel an auto on literally every champion in the game with the exception of kalista.

I'm might seem like a bug on vayne because her auto attack animations are relatively slow and you can often cancel an auto while a bolt is in flight. Similarly you can have a Garren leap into the air with 'Q' only to run away and smash something else instead. 

The point is the animations may start but there is always time to cancel so long as the animation doesn't finish, again Kalista is an exception.

Um it's not called an auto attack cancel? You could already see her arrow is headed towards the enemy in mid air and then you click right click to move, but the enemy just doesn't take damage. please I can tell the difference between the two lol...

Oh {{champion:37}} still needs some love guys she is the same boat as {{champion:38}} too far guys. Yeah I know you gave her some love this patch but really guys you have to be sooo close to get her buff can you at lest make it a little wider and her heal is not viable. For the record I don't play {{champion:37}} I'm the mid or adc that gets healed by her and it could be better. Well at least you guys are trying. I can see that.

Sona is well off already. If she falls behind, her utility is still immensely strong in teamfights, when shes ahead, a Rabadon's, Luden's or Lichbane pushes her damage over the top.
I still don't see how her heal is not viable? She gives a shield over a (I'd admit) small heal but that's not full point here. The shield is already very valuable for the laning phase/teamfights and the heal will build up over time provided you don't go guns blazing every single time someone hits you.
Buffing one part of Sona's utility stuffed kit essentially unbalances it, forcing Riot to alter another part of her kit in order to at least give her a weakness.
